response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our exclusive product, which holds immense value to us and has the potential to significantly benefit you. After careful consideration, we propose a transaction where you could acquire this product at a price of $950,000. This offer reflects our commitment to finding a mutually beneficial solution while ensuring a fair return for our investment in the product. We believe this price aligns well with the value it offers to you, considering its worth to you is $800,000. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 950000}
